svg: (: Originally we were working with: width="2000" height="500" : Look at the SVG viewBox attribute: set this to stretch from 0 0 to a set of max values for X and Y: the larger these are the smaller the plot shrinks. : try to start: viewBox="0 0 3000 1500" : Try removing the width and height attributes and adding a viewBox instead, scaling the coordinate system. :) Color Key:ActionSpeakers24intro11Color Key:ActionSpeakers15Another Day, Another Drachma12Color Key:ActionSpeakers33A Debt to Pay14Color Key:ActionSpeakers29The Wolf Hunt16Color Key:ActionSpeakers3The Wolf and Snake3Color Key:ActionSpeakers9Of Visions and Visionaries6Color Key:ActionSpeakers18Beware the Snakes6Color Key:ActionSpeakers12An Old Enemy and a New Ally12Color Key:ActionSpeakers34The Road to the Symposium23Color Key:ActionSpeakers28Land of the Lawless11Color Key:ActionSpeakers32A Prescription for Discovery16Color Key:ActionSpeakers5Pirate Hospitality5Color Key:ActionSpeakers18Rising from the Ashes10Color Key:ActionSpeakers4The Reunion5Color Key:ActionSpeakers22Paradise Lost13Color Key:ActionSpeakers6The Last Riddle5Color Key:ActionSpeakers40A Place of Twists and Turns12Color Key:ActionSpeakers16Home Is Where My Mother Is11Color Key:ActionSpeakers27The Olympian15Color Key:ActionSpeakers13The Cult and the Archon11Color Key:ActionSpeakers9Paint It Red4Color Key:ActionSpeakers13The Cultist King9Color Key:ActionSpeakers4Uprising7Color Key:ActionSpeakers12Public Opinion10Color Key:ActionSpeakers8Battle of Amphipolis4Color Key:ActionSpeakers8Homecoming6Color Key:ActionSpeakers4From the Shadows4Color Key:ActionSpeakers19Shadows of Serpents5Color Key:ActionSpeakers9The Gates of Atlantis9
